TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEquatable`1<T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IEquatable

span.span: The type of objects to compare.

summary.span: 定义由值类型或类实现的通用方法，旨在创建特定于类型的方法以确定实例的质量。

span.span: Defines a generalized method that a value type or class implements to create a type-specific method for determining equality of instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由其值可以赋值 （对于示例、 数字和字符串类） 的类型实现。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be equated (for example, the numeric and string classes). 值类型或类实现方法来创建特定类型的方法适合确定实例的质量。A value type or class implements the method to create a type-specific method suitable for determining equality of instances. > [!NOTE] > 接口定义方法，这可确定的实现类型实例的排序顺序。The interface defines the method, which determines the sort order of instances of the implementing type. 接口定义方法，这可确定的相等性的实现类型实例。The interface defines the method, which determines the equality of instances of the implementing type. 接口使用泛型集合对象，如， ，和时等方法中的相等性测试`Contains`， `IndexOf`， `LastIndexOf`，和`Remove`。The interface is used by generic collection objects such as , , and when testing for equality in such methods as `Contains`, `IndexOf`, `LastIndexOf`, and `Remove`. 它应为任何可能存储在通用集合中的对象实现。It should be implemented for any object that might be stored in a generic collection. ## Examples 请参阅示例方法。See the example for the method.

para.span: 替换的类型参数实现此接口的类型的接口。

span.span: Replace the type parameter of the interface with the type that is implementing this interface.

para.span: 如果你实现，还应重写的基类实现和，以便其行为是一致的方法。

span.span: If you implement , you should also override the base class implementations of and so that their behavior is consistent with that of the method.

para.span: 如果你重写，重写的实现也称为静态调用在类上的方法。

span.span: If you do override , your overridden implementation is also called in calls to the static method on your class.

para.span: 此外，你应该重载和运算符。

span.span: In addition, you should overload the and operators.

para.span: 这可确保所有测试相等都返回一致的结果。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results.

para.span: 有关如何重写，请参阅文章。

span.span: For information on overriding , see the article.

para.span: 对于值类型，您应始终执行，并重写以提高性能。

span.span: For a value type, you should always implement and override for better performance.

para.span: 框值类型，并依赖于反射来比较两个值相等。

span.span: boxes value types and relies on reflection to compare two values for equality.

para.span: 这两个实现和重写应返回一致的结果。

span.span: Both your implementation of and your override of should return consistent results.

para.span: 如果你实现，还应实现如果类型的实例可以是有序或排序。

span.span: If you implement , you should also implement if instances of your type can be ordered or sorted.

para.span: 如果你的类型实现，几乎总是还实现。

span.span: If your type implements , you almost always also implement .

para.span: 请注意，有一些设计中其中一种类型支持的顺序关系，但相等可能不同于排序的关系。

span.span: Note that there are some designs where a type supports an order relation, but equality may be distinct from an ordering relation.

para.span: 请考虑`Person`按字母顺序排序其中的类。

span.span: Consider a `Person` class where you sort alphabetically.

para.span: 具有相同名称的两名人员排序相同，但不是同一个人。

span.span: Two people with the same name sort the same, but are not the same person.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(!T other) cil managed
Public Function Equals (other As T) As Boolean

param.name: other
param.span: 一个与此对象进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with this object.

summary.span: 指示当前对象是否等于同一类型的另一个对象。

span.span: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.

returns.span: 如果当前对象等于 参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现方法旨在对相等性的类型的另一个对象执行测试`T`，与当前对象相同的类型。The implementation of the method is intended to perform a test for equality with another object of type `T`, the same type as the current object. 方法调用在以下情况下：The method is called in the following circumstances: - 当`Equals`调用方法和`other`参数是类型的强类型对象`T`。When the `Equals` method is called and the `other` argument is a strongly-typed object of type `T`. (如果`other`的类型不是`T`，基调用方法。(If `other` is not of type `T`, the base method is called. 两种方法，提供略有更好的性能。)Of the two methods, offers slightly better performance.) - 许多泛型集合对象的搜索方法调用时。When the search methods of a number of generic collection objects are called. 某些这些类型和其方法包括：Some of these types and their methods include the following: - 某些泛型重载的方法。Some of the generic overloads of the method. - 搜索方法类，其中包括， ， ，和。The search methods of the class, including , , , and . - 搜索方法类，其中包括和。The search methods of the class, including and . - 泛型的搜索方法类，其中包括和。The search methods of the generic class, including and . 换而言之，若要处理类的对象，将存储在数组或泛型集合对象的可能性，它是实现一个好办法，以便可以轻松地标识和操作对象。In other words, to handle the possibility that objects of a class will be stored in an array or a generic collection object, it is a good idea to implement so that the object can be easily identified and manipulated. 在实现时方法，定义的泛型类型参数指定的类型为适当的相等性。When implementing the method, define equality appropriately for the type specified by the generic type argument. 例如，如果类型参数是，定义适合的两个 32 位有符号整数进行比较的相等性。For example, if the type argument is , define equality appropriately for the comparison of two 32-bit signed integers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的部分实现`Person`类，该类实现和具有两个属性，`LastName`和`SSN`。The following example shows the partial implementation of a `Person` class that implements and has two properties, `LastName` and `SSN`. 方法返回`True`如果`SSN`两个属性`Person`对象完全相同; 否则，它将返回`False`。The method returns `True` if the `SSN` property of two `Person` objects is identical; otherwise, it returns `False`. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/EqualsEx2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/EqualsEx2.vb#3)] `Person` 然后可以将对象存储在对象，并可以由标识`Contains`方法，如以下示例所示。`Person` objects can then be stored in a object and can be identified by the `Contains` method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/cs/Snippet12.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.GenericIEquatable.Equals#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.GenericIEquatable.Equals/vb/Snippet12.vb#12)]

para.span: 这可确保所有测试相等都返回一致的结果的示例所示。

span.span: This ensures that all tests for equality return consistent results, which the example illustrates.
